channel.title: CVE Feed for redhat -- CloudForms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for redhat -- CloudForms

item.title: CVE-2017-15123|2024-08-05T19:50:16.217Z -- redhat -- cloudforms
item.description: A flaw was found in the CloudForms web interface, versions 5.8 - 5.10, where the RSS feed URLs are not properly restricted to authenticated users only. An attacker could use this flaw to view potentially sensitive information from CloudForms including data such as newly created virtual machines.
